SEARCH
Package ms.model

Record Class GridDimension

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
ms.model.GridDimension
public record GridDimension(int height, int width) extends Record
The GridDimension record defines the dimensions a minefield grid. It provides methods for position validation.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GridDimension(int height, int width)
    Constructs a GridDimension with the specified height and width.

  • Constructor Details

    • GridDimension

      public GridDimension(int height, int width)
      Constructs a GridDimension with the specified height and width. Both dimensions must be positive values.
      Parameters:
      height - the height of the grid
      width - the width of the grid
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if height or width is not positive

  • Method Details

    • fromDifficulty

      public static GridDimension fromDifficulty(Difficulty difficulty)
      Creates a GridDimension from the specified difficulty level.
      Parameters:
      difficulty - the Difficulty level
      Returns:
      a GridDimension with the appropriate dimensions for the difficulty

    • totalCells

      public int totalCells()
      Calculates the total number of cells in the grid.
      Returns:
      the total number of cells (height × width)

    • isValidPosition

      public boolean isValidPosition(Position position)
      Checks if the given position is within the valid bounds of the grid.
      Parameters:
      position - the Position to validate
      Returns:
      true if the position is valid, false otherwise

    • validatePosition

      public void validatePosition(Position position)
      Validates that the given position is within the grid bounds, and throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if is not.
      Parameters:
      position - the Position to validate
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the position is outside the valid range

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
